derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French colombine, from medieval Latin colombina (herba) 'dovelike (plant'), from Latin columba 'dove' (from the supposed resemblance of the flower to a cluster of five doves)

means.word_mean: 1. a plant of the genus Aquilegia having irregular showy spurred flowers; north temperate regions especially mountains
